solution_line_template: To make the cakes, Traci and Harris used a total of {num_cakes_total} cakes * {flour_per_cake}g of flour per cake = <<{num_cakes_total}*{flour_per_cake}={total_flour_needed}>>{total_flour_needed}g of flour.
Traci therefore brought {total_flour_needed}g of needed flour - {harris_flour}g of flour from Harris' flour = {traci_flour_brought}g of flour from her own house.
